channel.title: Setting up shops plzzz hlep
channel.description:
can sumbody plz set me up with a link for a tutorial on how to make shops i have already tried searching but i dont get very good results
thanks, smef45

item.title: Setting up shops plzzz hlep
item.dc:creator: @mochronik mochronik
item.description:
@mochronik wrote:

-.- people should really start getting msn or aims or somthing -.- its 2009 -.- ANYWAYS ill still help u i guess :\

the “noquest” is simple. heres a command just copy/paste it in with you’re other commands. :

}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noquest”) && playerRights >= 0) {
for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
q1 = 15;
q2 = 15;
q3 = 15;
q4 = 15;
q5 = 15;
q6 = 15;
q7 = 15;
q8 = 15;
q9 = 15;
q10 = 15;
q11 = 15;
}
thats just a simple one u have to do the command than relog. u can change player rights if you’d like.
as for adding items ill do in a sec meanwhile add that[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 21, 2009, 12:13:11 am[/size][hr]adding more items: SIMPLE
get then name of the store you want to add a item into
go into shops.cfg and look for the shop name you want.
and than just add itemID TAB amount

easy as that

Read full topic

o ye forgot after that u gotta add it into shops.cfg like this:

shop = 1 shop name 2 2 ItemID TAB amount TAB itemID TAB amount and etc…
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 20, 2009, 11:30:37 pm[/size][hr]simple just check ur other wanneshop codes that are already there. of simply use CTR+f and in search typer the wanne code + the ID and see if it comes up ( search UP and DOWN)
if it comes up its taken
if it dosent feel free to use it. :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 20, 2009, 11:46:50 pm[/size][hr]did that help u at all?

item.title: Setting up shops plzzz hlep
item.dc:creator: @mochronik mochronik
item.description:
@mochronik wrote:

ok nvm that. ill just guide you through making a new NPC for shops.

#1 choosing an npc.: go through ur npc.cfg and choose a NPC you would like. remember the ID
#2 add it into autospawn.cfg example:

spawn = ID X.coords Y.coords 0 0 0 0 0 1
the 0s are coords. IF you want it to move around. if not just keep as 0s (for shops keep as 0s)

#3 go into client.java and add this :

		} else if (NPCID == ###) {     (  npc id # ) 
			// Aubury rune shop      
			PutNPCCoords = true;
			WanneShop = 2; // Aubury Magic Shop   ( wanne shop = # MAKE SURE THE NUMBER IS NOT TAKEN  //shop name.)

i made this in a hurry since im busy but if i missed anything or made a mistake somwhere please tell me

Read full topic

@mochronik wrote:

smerf45:

where would i add that code into ?? and yes the original source is based off of delta but it now starts you in edgeville

simple in ur client.java search (CTRL+f) any pre exisiting command like for instance “pickup” and above it under the last bracket ( } ) paste the code in with the ending bracker at end if u get 100 errors u prolly misplaced a bracket or have and extra ;)_

item.title: Setting up shops plzzz hlep
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“darkboe pkz, post:9, topic:274684”]if u wana be cheesy about it u can just open ur config files find the sops section were it has the shop name then item ids then amout and find that npcs id move it were i want it u can change the name but remember if ur changeing a name in there to always do like this
if the name is
zaffs_staff_shop when u change it make sure u do the underscores beetween ur spaces
then when its lokated were u want it u can change all the item ids to the items u want in that shop
if u need to see item names and ids open ur config files and to to item files and look there
ty for reading
FYI those are instructions based off of deltascape or ddsspeced scape server basees[/quote]You aren’t teaching him nothing. Your teaching him too leech, like I’m guessing you do? Or do you just not know how to add a shop?

Read full topic

item.title: Setting up shops plzzz hlep
item.dc:creator: @darkboe_pkz darkboe pkz
item.description:
@darkboe_pkz wrote:

if u wana be cheesy about it u can just open ur config files find the sops section were it has the shop name then item ids then amout and find that npcs id move it were i want it u can change the name but remember if ur changeing a name in there to always do like this
if the name is
zaffs_staff_shop when u change it make sure u do the underscores beetween ur spaces
then when its lokated were u want it u can change all the item ids to the items u want in that shop
if u need to see item names and ids open ur config files and to to item files and look there
ty for reading
FYI those are instructions based off of deltascape or ddsspeced scape server basees
